definition: life and death are ruled by fate (idiom)
to be born/to give birth/life/to grow/raw/uncooked/student
to die/impassable/uncrossable/inflexible/rigid/extremely/damned
to have/there is/there are/to exist/to be
life/fate/order or command/to assign a name, title etc

sentences.english: You are born and you will die. Don’t waste the time in between.
sentences.chinese: 生死有命，不要浪費時間。

definition: planning is with man, accomplishing with heaven (idiom); Man proposes but God disposes.
pinyin: mou2 shi4 zai4 ren2 , cheng2 shi4 zai4 tian1

definition: to submit to the will of heaven/to resign oneself to fate/to trust to luck
better a bad life than a good death (idiom)
pinyin: hao3 si3 bu4 ru2 lai4 huo2 zhe5

definition: Heaven helps the worthy (idiom)
pinyin: ji2 ren2 zi4 you3 tian1 xiang4

definition: Since they have come, we should make them comfortable (idiom). Since we're here, take it easy./Since this is so, we should accept it./Now we have come, let's stay and take the rough with the smooth./If you can't do anything to prevent it, you might as well sit back and enjoy it.
pinyin: ji4 lai2 zhi1 , ze2 an1 zhi1

definition: disaster and happiness do not follow rules (idiom); future blessings and misfortunes are unpredictable
younger generations will do all right on their own (idiom)
pinyin: er2 sun1 zi4 you3 er2 sun1 fu2

definition: the matter depends on the individual (idiom); it is a matter for your own effort/With effort, one can achieve anything.
providence/the Will of Heaven
restrain your grief, accept fate (condolence phrase)
life or death
to try one's utmost/to strive
constant (math.)/quota/fixed number (e.g. of places on a bus)/fixed quantity (e.g. load of truck)/destiny
one is bound for good fortune after surviving a great disaster (proverb)
pinyin: da4 nan4 bu4 si3 , bi4 you3 hou4 fu2

definition: to come to accept an unpleasant fact/to get over sth/to cheer up
saving a life is more meritorious than building a seven-floor pagoda (idiom)
pinyin: jiu4 ren2 yi1 ming4 sheng4 zao4 qi1 ji2 fu2 tu2
related.word: 救人一命勝造七級浮屠
